mapper.select: /* 게시글 목록 조회 */ SELECT MORNING_ROUTINE_SNO AS morningRoutineSno /* 순번(시퀀스: MORNING_ROUTINE_SNO_SEQ) */ , RECORD_DATE AS recordDate /* 기록날짜 */ , BEDTIME AS bedtime /* 전날 취침시간 */ , SCHEDULED_WAKE_UP_TIME AS scheduledWakeUpTime /* 기상 예전 시간 */ , WAKE_UP_TIME AS wakeUpTime /* 기상 시간 */ , WALK_YN AS walkYn /* 산책 여부 */ , SUCCESS_FAILURE_YN AS successFailureYn /* 성공 여부 */ , NOTE AS note /* 비고 */ , GRATITUDE_JOURNAL AS gratitudeJournal /* 감사일기 */ , REG_DATE AS regDate /* 등록일시 */ , MOD_DATE AS modDate /* 수정일시 */ FROM MORNING_ROUTINE_INFO
